00017 #define SHT11_POWER_PORT 1
00018 #define SHT11_POWER_PIN  7
00019 #define SHT11_POWER SHT11_POWER_PORT, SHT11_POWER_PIN
00020 
00021 #define SHT11_SCLK_PORT  1
00022 #define SHT11_SCLK_PIN   6
00023 #define SHT11_SCLK SHT11_SCLK_PORT, SHT11_SCLK_PIN

00027 #define SHT11_DATA SHT11_DATA_PORT, SHT11_DATA_PIN
00028 
00029 /* Command bytes */
00030 #define SHT11_CMD_READ_TEMP     3 
00031 #define SHT11_CMD_READ_HUMIDITY 5
00032 #define SHT11_CMD_READ_SR       7
00033 #define SHT11_CMD_WRITE_SR      6
00034 #define SHT11_CMD_SOFT_RESET    30
00035 
00036 /* Status register masks */
00037 #define SHT11_SR_HEATER  (1 << 2)
00038 #define SHT11_SR_RELOAD  (1 << 1)
00039 #define SHT11_SR_LOW_RES (1 << 0)
00040

00045 #define SHT11_LOW_RES_ON   0x01
00046 #define SHT11_LOW_RES_OFF  0x02
00047 #define SHT11_HEATER_ON    0x04
00048 #define SHT11_HEATER_OFF   0x08
00049 #define SHT11_RELOAD_ON    0x10
00050 #define SHT11_RELOAD_OFF   0x20
